title: Riot please
body: So i was just in a game where i was top lane and picked yasuo and our jungler said this "I shouldnt pick a smart pick if your playing yasuo" yasuo being my main i take this as an insult and type "?" he then replies the same thing i said dude i main yasuo still knowing this he locks in teemo jungle so i dodge becuase in the end 2lp is better then losing 10 and now i have a half an hour ban becuase i dident want to suffer pain and neither did my teammates come on riot

replies.body: Lmao. Teemo jungle is better than yasuo top tbh ðŸ™ƒ
so you would rather play teemo jungle
I'm not sure I'd go that far but Yas top is definitely not good
